resources.string: SD Maid Pro offers better results, more features and options for power users.

You can choose between a one-time purchase and a cheaper yearly subscription.\nThe subscription starts with a free 14-day trial, after which you\'ll be charged once per year. Trial and subscription are cancellable at any time.\nSame features, just different pricing models.

Together, we made it to the first release! Thank you for helping me! Development will of course continue, but you can now switch to more stable builds, if you want to. Do this by opting-out of testing on Google Play.
Small note: Ratings given during testing are only visible to me, I\'d appreciate it if you could give SD Maid a public rating if you are happy.
